activities.description: Learn and practice vocabulary related to startup concepts.  The AI will provide a list of 10 startup terms. For each term, the student will provide a Chinese translation, and the AI will provide feedback on accuracy. The AI will then generate example sentences using the vocabulary.

Practice introducing oneself and one's startup using a series of prompts. The student will describe their startup, their role, and why they need investment.  The AI will provide feedback on grammar, vocabulary, and fluency, generating appropriate responses.

Learn and practice vocabulary related to investment.  The AI will provide a list of 10 investment terms.  The student will provide Chinese translations and example sentences.  The AI will provide feedback on accuracy.

Practice pitching your startup's investment needs.  The AI will present potential investor profiles.  The student will tailor their pitch to each investor profile, explaining their business plan and highlighting key investment opportunities.

Learn and practice common business phrases for meetings and negotiations.  The AI will provide a list of 15 phrases.  The student will provide Chinese translations and usage examples.  The AI will provide feedback.

Engage in simulated negotiations with the AI. The AI will present negotiation scenarios. The student will practice using common business phrases and persuasive language in Chinese to achieve desired outcomes.
Learn and practice vocabulary for introductions and networking.  The AI will present a list of 15 networking terms. The student will provide Chinese translations.
Engage in a simulated networking session with the AI. The AI will present different networking scenarios. The student will practice introductions and small talk in Chinese.
Review previously learned vocabulary and phrases. The AI will randomly generate questions using previously learned vocabulary and phrases, checking for understanding.
The AI will present various scenario-based questions, testing the student's ability to apply learned vocabulary in conversation. The student will respond in Chinese.
A brief vocabulary quiz focusing on previously learned terms. The AI will ask questions testing comprehension of terms.
Reflection on the week's learning and receiving personalized feedback on areas for improvement from the AI.
A comprehensive simulated startup pitch to Chinese investors. The AI will provide feedback on delivery, grammar, and overall effectiveness.
Review and make adjustments to the simulated pitch based on feedback received.  Students can also choose to rehearse their pitch with the AI.
